stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace 3. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice.
text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] 3. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice.
title: Data Raven
